items.sentence: I know that Tom will leave for Australia soon.
I heard Tom wanted to go to Australia with us.
I don't think Tom should go back to Australia.
I don't think Tom knows a lot about Australia.
We hope to find a solution in the near future.
I hope that you get to do what you want to do.
We hope that this problem will be solved soon.
Let's just hope we have better luck next time.
Do all four of your grandparents speak French?
I wanted Tom to stop eating so much junk food.
I wanted Tom to tell me why he didn't do that.
It would've been impossible without your help.
I know that Tom dislikes me, but I don't care.
I'm absolutely certain that Tom won't do that.
There are a lot of things that we need to buy.
The way Tom and Mary met is quite interesting.
It isn't something that comes naturally to me.
The police searched Tom's apartment for clues.
The judge ruled Tom's confession inadmissible.
Some of the things Tom said didn't make sense.
